events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I want to request a refund.
The system categorized the customer's request under 'Refund' due to keywords related to money back and return.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
Hello! I am here to help you with your refund request. Could you please share your order number?
Could you also provide us with the reason for requesting a refund and if the product was unopened?
My order number is 12345678. The product was different than described online and therefore not usable for me.
We can process your refund immediately. Please send the product back within 14 days with the original packaging.
Thank you for the quick response. I will ship the item back tomorrow as per instructions.
We received the returned product and have processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received and if you need any further assistance with our services.
Since the refund was successfully processed and there are no further issues, your case is now closed. Thank you!
